name: The Merchant Memoirs
description: What if you had a second chance at life? That's what happened to Engel Marx, a failed merchant who is killed in his previous life and now through the screw-up of his Guardian Angel, he now is in youth again! How will doing something just a bit differently drastically alter his life?
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 512 MB Graphics: 1920X1080 Additional Notes: Any potato can run this
